reasoning: GCA incidence varies by age and geography. Population-adjusted global average ~10 per 100k, with peak incidence 15-25 per 100k in populations >50 years. Strong registry data from Northern Europe and North America.
source: Salvarani C et al. (2004). Epidemiology of giant cell arteritis. Clin Exp Rheumatol. 22(6 Suppl 36):S23-7
